hf.name: Professor Archibald
hf.appearance: Tall, with wild gray hair and thick glasses

tr.name: Ghost of Emily Bronte
tr.appearance: Ethereal, translucent figure in Victorian dress

json_to_edit.voice_over: The keys clacked with an otherworldly rhythm, revealing secrets yet to unfold.
json_to_edit.description: A haunted typewriter mysteriously types out future events in an old, dusty attic.
json_to_edit.location: Attic of an abandoned Victorian mansion
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with moonlight filtering through a small window
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Howling wind, creaking floorboards, distant thunder
json_to_edit.name: Prophetic Typewriter
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Lila Frost and Professor Archibald investigate a haunted typewriter that predicts the future, encountering the ghost of Emily Bronte.

qa.action: Victorian mansion silhouetted against a stormy sky, lightning illuminating the attic window.

hf.action: Lila and Professor Archibald cautiously ascending the attic stairs, flashlights in hand.

tr.action: The haunted typewriter sitting on an old desk, keys moving on their own.

xc.action: Paper emerging from the typewriter with eerily accurate predictions of future events.

ka.action: Lila and Professor Archibald reacting with shock as they read the predictions.

fn.action: The ghost of Emily Bronte materializing near the typewriter, observing Lila and the Professor.

af.action: Emily Bronte's ghost reaching out towards the typewriter, her fingers passing through the keys.

edit_command: Expand the scene by adding three new shots that show the characters interacting with Emily Bronte's ghost and discovering the source of the typewriter's power.

qa.action: Victorian mansion silhouetted against a stormy sky, lightning illuminating the attic window.

hf.action: Lila and Professor Archibald cautiously ascending the attic stairs, flashlights in hand.

tr.action: The haunted typewriter sitting on an old desk, keys moving on their own.

xc.action: Paper emerging from the typewriter with eerily accurate predictions of future events.

ka.action: Lila and Professor Archibald reacting with shock as they read the predictions.

fn.action: The ghost of Emily Bronte materializing near the typewriter, observing Lila and the Professor.

af.action: Emily Bronte's ghost reaching out towards the typewriter, her fingers passing through the keys.

bx.action: Lila cautiously approaches Emily's ghost, attempting to communicate while the Professor watches in awe.

yz.action: Emily's ghost points to a hidden compartment in the typewriter, revealing a glowing crystal embedded within.

wp.action: As Lila and the Professor examine the crystal, the typewriter springs to life, emitting a blinding light that envelops the room, connecting the past and future.

label.rationale: we can expand the scene by adding three new shots that show the characters interacting with emily bronte's ghost and discovering the source of the typewriter's power. this will enhance the narrative and provide more depth to the supernatural elements of the scene. we'll add these shots at the end of the existing sequence, maintaining the current order and adding new entries to the "shots" object and updating the "list_display_order" accordingly. we'll also increase the "number_of_shots" from 7 to 10 to reflect these additions.

value.action: Lila cautiously approaches Emily's ghost, attempting to communicate while the Professor watches in awe.
Emily's ghost points to a hidden compartment in the typewriter, revealing a glowing crystal embedded within.
As Lila and the Professor examine the crystal, the typewriter springs to life, emitting a blinding light that envelops the room, connecting the past and future.
